content_html: Kathmandu, Sept 19: Speaker Devraj Ghimire has expressed the confidence that only if the Nepali people understand anti-constitutional activities in time, will there be the protection of the constitution and the promotion of the rule of law. Extending congratulations and best wishes to all Nepali sisters and brothers

title: Anti-constitutional activities should be understood on time: Speaker Ghimire
